name: CreateMonitorForWebsets
description:
Create a scheduled monitor to update Websets with fresh data.

Use this tool to set up a new monitor that automatically updates Websets. It enables execution of 'search' and 'refresh' operations based on your defined schedule, using cron expressions and timezone settings, to keep your Websets current without manual intervention.

parameters.name: monitor_configuration
parameters.description: JSON object describing the configuration for the new monitor, including schedule, search and refresh operations.
